cause.description:
There are lots of people who want to be famous. If you're one of those people, then join. If you think this is selfish and inconciderate, than ignore it and enjoy not being rich and famous.
1. We are awesome.
2. We are going to live forever.
3. We're gonna learn how to fly.
cause.mission: To become famous and live glamorous lives
cause.name: Help Me Be Famous!
